id: scenario-value-scanner-grandparent-scenarios-community-serving on community boards and governance bodies
title: Serving on community boards and governance bodies
description: Serving on community boards and governance bodies
content:
Scenario: Serving on community boards and governance bodies
    Given Margaret has time, experience, and judgment to contribute
    And community boards need skilled, committed members
    When Margaret serves on nonprofit boards or advisory committees
    Then the community_elohim should recognize governance work
    And it should value her time and expertise in decision-making
    And it should track her board service as care contribution
    And governance participation should accumulate care tokens
    And community should benefit from her wisdom and service
    And retired elders should be valued in community leadership
